list.title: LS_ROUTE_KEY
list.description: Local storage key for storing the previous route path. Used for navigation history and back button functionality.

list.title: api
list.description: Axios instance configured for GraphQL API requests. Includes base URL from configuration and 10-second timeout.

list.title: api
list.description: GraphQL API endpoint URL constructed from configuration.

list.title: api
list.description: GraphQL API endpoint URL constructed from configuration.

list.title: apiDir
list.description: Directory path where the search index will be saved.

list.title: apiDir
list.description: Directory path where the routes file will be saved.

list.title: buildSearchIndex.js
list.description: Build script for generating the search index from GraphQL API. This script fetches all published content (pages, news, publications, sections, tags) from the GraphQL API and creates a searchable JSON index for the client-side search functionality.

list.title: buildSitemap.js
list.description:
Build script for generating sitemap.xml and routes.json files. This script fetches all published content from the GraphQL API and generates:

  1. A routes.json file containing all application routes
  2. A sitemap.xml file for search engine optimization

list.title: buildStatusUrl
list.description: Builds the URL for the status endpoint based on current environment. Uses localhost for development and production URL for deployed environments.

list.title: checkIfValidPage
list.description: Checks if an array represents a valid page (has content).

list.title: configPromise
list.description: Promise that resolves to the application configuration. Uses dynamic import for browser builds, require for server builds.

list.title: createDocumentationHTML
list.description: Main function to create HTML documentation from markdown. Reads project-documentation.md, converts it to HTML, and generates a complete documentation website with professional styling.

list.title: creators/createDocumentationHTML.js
list.description: Documentation HTML Generator for the SPAC project. Converts project-documentation.md to professional HTML documentation with dark/light theme support, syntax highlighting, and responsive design.

list.title: dateFormat~target
list.description: Timezone offset correction: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7556591/is-the-javascript-date-object-always-one-day-off/31732581#31732581

list.title: fetchData
list.description: Fetches data from a given endpoint and returns parsed JSON. Generic utility function for making API calls.

list.title: fileName
list.description: Filename for the generated search index JSON file.

list.title: filename
list.description: Filename for the generated routes JSON file.

list.title: generateHTMLTemplate
list.description: Generates a complete HTML template with embedded CSS and JavaScript. Creates a professional documentation page with dark/light theme support, syntax highlighting, responsive design, and accessibility features.

list.title: getAllNews
list.description: Fetches all published news posts from the GraphQL API.

list.title: getAllSections
list.description: Fetches all published sections with their associated pages. Used for building navigation menus and site structure.

list.title: getContentByTag
list.description: Fetches all content associated with a specific tag. Returns pages, news, publications, meetings, and biographies tagged with the specified slug.

list.title: getDefaultThumbnail
list.description: Generates a default thumbnail image URL. Always returns the configured default thumbnail image, resized to standard dimensions.

list.title: getExternalFile
list.description: Opens an external file URL in a new tab. Used for files hosted outside the application's file server.

list.title: getFile
list.description: Downloads a file from the internal file server. Constructs a file server URL with path and name parameters and opens it in a new tab.

list.title: getFrontPageNews
list.description: Fetches a limited number of recent news posts for the front page.

list.title: getHash
list.description: Generates an MD5 hash from a string.

list.title: getHeadshotLink
list.description: Generates an optimized headshot image URL. Creates a square, grayscale headshot image with smart cropping.

list.title: getOffset
list.description: Gets the absolute position of a DOM element. Calculates the cumulative offset from the top-left corner of the document.

list.title: getPage
list.description: Fetches a single page by slug from the GraphQL API.

list.title: getPageQuery
list.description: Builds GraphQL query to fetch a single page by slug.

list.title: getPost
list.description: Fetches a single news post by slug from the GraphQL API.

list.title: getPostQuery
list.description: Builds GraphQL query to fetch a single news post by slug.

list.title: getSearchIndex
list.description: Loads and processes the search index for client-side search functionality. Transforms all content items by adding appropriate parent paths for URL generation. Combines pages, news, meetings, biographies, publications, sections, and tags into a unified search index.

list.title: getThumbnailLink
list.description: Generates a thumbnail image URL for media material. Uses the provided thumbnail or falls back to default image. Automatically handles PDF files by using default thumbnail.

list.title: handleClicks
list.description: Vue mixin for handling clicks on dynamically generated content links. Provides intelligent routing for internal links and tracking for external files.

list.title: handleClicks.methods.handleClicks
list.description: Handles click events on anchor tags within dynamic content. Intercepts internal links for Vue Router navigation and tracks file downloads. Provides browser compatibility and handles various edge cases.

list.title: lastModMap
list.description: Map to store last modification dates for each route. Used for sitemap generation with proper lastmod values.

list.title: md
list.description: Markdown-it instance configured with application settings and plugins. Includes named headers plugin for automatic header ID generation and attrs plugin for custom HTML attributes in markdown.

list.title: module.exports
list.description: Configured Vuetify instance with SPAC theme and settings.

list.title: module.exports
list.description: Export the configured Vue Router instance.

list.title: module.exports
list.description: Main Vuex store instance for the SPAC application. Manages all global state, mutations, actions, and getters.

list.title: mutations
list.description: Vuex mutations for synchronously modifying state. All state changes must go through mutations to maintain reactivity.

list.title: mutations.CLEAR_CACHE
list.description: Clears the application cache Map.

list.title: mutations.CLEAR_LOCAL_STORAGE
list.description: Removes the route key from localStorage.

list.title: mutations.SET_API_STATUS
list.description: Sets the API status code.

list.title: mutations.SET_APP_READY
list.description: Sets the application ready state.

list.title: mutations.SET_CACHE
list.description: Caches a query result with its hash key.

list.title: mutations.SET_CONFIG
list.description: Sets the application configuration.

list.title: mutations.SET_ROUTES
list.description: Sets the routes data from API.

list.title: mutations.SET_SEARCH_INDEX
list.description: Sets the search index data.

list.title: mutations.SET_SECTIONS
list.description: Sets the sections data.

list.title: mutations.SET_SELECTED_COUNTY_DATA
list.description: Sets the selected county data.

list.title: opts
list.description: Vuetify configuration options. Defines theme colors, icon font, and other UI framework settings.

list.title: query
list.description: GraphQL query to fetch all published content for search indexing. Retrieves pages, news posts, publications, sections, and tags with their associated metadata, content, and relationships.

list.title: query
list.description: GraphQL query to fetch all published content for route and sitemap generation. Retrieves slugs and update timestamps for pages, news, publications, meetings, and tags.

list.title: queryEndpoint
list.description: Generic function to execute GraphQL queries against the API.

list.title: renderToHtml
list.description: Renders markdown content to HTML. Processes markdown text through the configured markdown-it instance with all enabled plugins and returns sanitized HTML.

list.title: router
list.description: Vue Router instance configuration with all application routes. Uses history mode for clean URLs and implements lazy loading for code splitting.

list.title: routes
list.description: Array to store all generated routes.

list.title: scrollBehavior
list.description: Custom scroll behavior for route navigation. Always scrolls to top of page when navigating to a new route.

list.title: searchIndexPromise
list.description: Promise that resolves to the search index data. Uses dynamic import for browser builds, require for server builds.

list.title: sections
list.description: Array of content sections to process for route generation.

list.title: src/filters.js
list.description: Vue filters for the SPAC application. Provides global filters for date formatting, text manipulation, and data transformation. All filters are registered globally and available in all Vue templates.

list.title: src/main.js
list.description: Main entry point for the SPAC (Statistical Analysis Center) Vue.js application. This file configures the Vue instance with all necessary plugins, polyfills, and global settings.

list.title: src/mixins/handleClicks.js
list.description: Vue mixin for handling dynamic content link clicks. Intercepts anchor tag clicks in dynamic content and provides internal routing and external link handling with Google Analytics tracking.

list.title: src/plugins/vuetify.js
list.description: Vuetify plugin configuration for the SPAC application. Sets up Vuetify UI framework with custom theme colors and Material Design Icons. Defines the primary color scheme and component styling for the application.

list.title: src/router.js
list.description: Vue Router configuration for the SPAC application. Defines all application routes with lazy loading for optimal performance. Includes route guards and navigation behavior configuration.

list.title: src/services/Content.js
list.description: Content service for the SPAC application. Provides functions to fetch various types of content from the GraphQL API including pages, news posts, publications, meetings, biographies, and site descriptions. All functions include XSS protection and error handling with EventBus notifications.

list.title: src/services/Download.js
list.description: Download service for the SPAC application. Provides functions to handle file downloads from both internal file server and external URLs. Opens files in new tabs with security attributes.

list.title: src/services/Image.js
list.description: Image service for the SPAC application. Provides functions to generate optimized image URLs using Thumbor image server. Handles thumbnails, headshots, and default images with automatic resizing and cropping.

list.title: src/services/Markdown.js
list.description: Markdown service for the SPAC application. Provides markdown-to-HTML rendering functionality with support for named headers and custom attributes. Uses markdown-it with configured plugins.

list.title: src/services/Search.js
list.description: Search service for the SPAC application. Provides functionality to load and process the search index for client-side search. Transforms content items by adding parent paths for proper URL generation.

list.title: src/services/Utilities.js
list.description: Utility functions for the SPAC application. Provides common helper functions for string manipulation, validation, DOM operations, date formatting, and Strapi enum handling.

list.title: src/store.js
list.description: Vuex store configuration for the SPAC application. Manages global application state including configuration, routes, search index, caching, and API status. Provides centralized state management for all components.

list.title: state
list.description: Application state object containing all global state properties.

list.title: stripHTML
list.description: Removes HTML tags from a string.

list.title: thumborURL
list.description: Thumbor URL builder instance configured with security key and image server URL. Used to generate optimized image URLs with resizing, cropping, and filtering capabilities.

list.title: titleCase
list.description: Converts a string to title case (first letter of each word capitalized).

list.title: truncate
list.description: Truncates a string to a specified number of words. Adds ellipsis (...) if the string was truncated.
